fields.request: Manual QA: Exercise changelog report lazy loading
fields.request_details:
1. Sign in as the release manager and open **System â†’ Changelog Report** in the Django admin.
2. Confirm the Unreleased section renders and scroll to the loading indicator to fetch the next release block.
3. Hard refresh the admin page and verify the sections reload, showing the cache is transient.
4. Visit http://localhost:8888/changelog/ and repeat the infinite-scroll check, confirming the commit summaries match the admin view.
